reviewText: This episode truly captures the spirit of the what the 1970s Raiders were all about. Of all the America's Game episodes I have watched the 1976 Raiders was one of the best and I was not even a Raiders fan in the 70s.  The America's Game series is easily the most inspired series ever created by NFL Films.
If you are a Raider fan this is for you. Good video
Love the old footage of Snake, Ghost, etc.  Box says 65 minutes, try 45 minutes in actuality!  Wish NFL Films would be more accurate with their products!
